properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Halleluya halleluya yentha papinainanu Yesu cherchukonu natanchu prakatinchudi{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Entha paapinainanu Yesu cherchukonunu Anchu nee suvaartanu anthata jaatinchudi{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Menduga kshamaapanan poorna samaadhaanamu Nentha paapikainan denchi cherchukonunu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Thana divya silvache deesi papashaapamun Nan pavitraparachunu naaku haayi nitchenu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Ghora paapinainanu nannu jerchukonunu Poornashuddi nichchunu swargamandu cherchunu{/lang-eng}
